about_the_game:
Elusive Verge is an exhilarating blend of open-world exploration and strategic warfare set in the boundless expanse of space. As a resourceful commander, your mission is to navigate the dangers of the cosmos, reclaim moons captured by a rogue A.I., and secure the future of your faction. With a rich narrative, dynamic environments, and deep strategic gameplay, Elusive Verge offers an immersive space odyssey unlike any other.

Dynamic Open-World Exploration

Travel through a vast, procedurally generated universe filled with celestial wonders, hidden artifacts, and untold dangers. Each journey promises new discoveries and challenges.

Strategic Base Building

Construct and expand orbital bases around moons. Develop your infrastructure, manage resources, and defend against hostile threats to ensure the survival of your command centers.

Tactical Space Combat

Engage in thrilling real-time battles against the rogue A.I. forces. Customize your fleet, leverage the environment, and employ advanced technologies to emerge victorious.

Resource Management and Colonization

Harvest resources from asteroids and moons to fuel your expansion. Colonize hostile territories, turning them into bastions of your civilization's resilience and ingenuity.

Deep Technology Research

Unlock and upgrade a vast array of technologies. From devastating weapons to critical life-support systems, your ability to adapt and innovate will be the key to your success.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Elusive Verge is an Early Access game, and the minimum specifications may change during development.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
